description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军创始人之一，中共早期领导人之一。
description.en: One of the founders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Liberation Army, and an early leader of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 张国焘的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Zhang Guotao.

description.zh-cn: 张国焘的父亲。
description.en: Father of Zhang Guotao.

description.zh-cn: 张国焘之子。
description.en: Son of Zhang Guotao.

description.zh-cn: 张国焘之子。
description.en: Son of Zhang Guotao.

description.zh-cn: 张国焘之子。
description.en: Son of Zhang Guotao.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义的先驱，中国共产党的主要创始人之一。
description.en: A pioneer of Chinese communism and a main founder of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军、中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Chinese Communist Party, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的第一代主要领导人之一。
description.en: One of the first-generation main leaders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期重要领导人之一。
description.en: One of the early important leaders of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元勋，中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一。
description.en: A founding father of the People's Republic of China, and one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党总裁，中华民国总统。
description.en: Leader of the Kuomintang and President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事委员会调查统计局负责人。
description.en: Head of the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics of the Military Commission of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的历史性政党，曾在大陆执政，现为台湾主要政党之一。
description.en: A historic political party in China, formerly ruling on the mainland and now one of the main political parties in Taiwan.

nodes.id: 军事委员会调查统计局

zh-cn: 军事委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府的特务情报机关。
description.en: The secret intelligence agency of the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China.

en: Fourth Front Army of the Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一，长征时期由张国焘领导。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, led by Zhang Guotao during the Long March.

en: First Front Army of the Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一，由中共中央直接领导。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, directly led by the Central Committee of the CCP.

nodes.id: 中国共产党临时中央委员会 (1935年—1936年)

zh-cn: 中国共产党临时中央委员会 (1935年—1936年)

description.zh-cn: 长征途中，张国焘在卓木碉宣布另立的“中央”，与毛泽东领导的中共中央对立。
description.en: A rival 'Central Committee' established by Zhang Guotao in Zhuomudiao during the Long March, in opposition to the CCP Central Committee led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 一个国际共产主义组织的联合，对早期中国共产党有重要影响。
description.en: A federation of international communist organizations that had a significant influence on the early Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所著名高等学府，新文化运动和五四运动的中心。
description.en: A famous institution of higher learning in China, the center of the New Culture Movement and the May Fourth Movement.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大多伦多的一个地区。
description.en: A district in Toronto, Canada.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一次大规模军事转移，对中共历史有决定性影响。
description.en: A large-scale military retreat by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, which had a decisive impact on the history of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 一场以学生为主导的爱国运动，对中国近代史影响深远。
description.en: A student-led patriotic movement with a profound impact on modern Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 张国焘在鄂豫皖根据地发动的内部清洗运动。
description.en: An internal purge campaign launched by Zhang Guotao in the Eyuwan Soviet Area.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共一大代表，是中国共产党的创始人之一。
description.en: As a delegate to the First National Congress of the CCP, he was one of the founders of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 张国焘是中国人民解放军创始人之一。
description.en: Zhang Guotao is one of the founders of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 因张国焘投靠中国国民党而被开除党籍。
description.en: Expelled from the party after defecting to the Kuomintang.

relationships.target: 军事委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 在投靠国民党后，加入军统从事反共特务活动。
description.en: After defecting to the Kuomintang, he joined the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics to engage in anti-communist secret service activities.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正将张国焘交给军统领导人戴笠“妥善运用”。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek handed Zhang Guotao over to Dai Li, the head of the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics, for 'proper utilization'.

description.zh-cn: 在长征途中，因坚持南下和反对中共中央北上决定而与毛泽东等人产生严重分歧，并另立“中央”，导致党内分裂。1937年3月遭到毛泽东等人的批判斗争。
description.en: During the Long March, he had serious disagreements with Mao Zedong and others over his insistence on going south and opposing the Central Committee's decision to go north. He established a rival 'Central Committee', leading to a split in the party. He was criticized and struggled against by Mao Zedong and others in March 1937.

description.zh-cn: 向毛泽东报告了张国焘要求武力解决分歧的密电，促使毛泽东率领中央纵队先行北上。
description.en: Reported to Mao Zedong about Zhang Guotao's secret cable demanding a forceful resolution of their differences, which prompted Mao to lead the central column north ahead of schedule.

relationships.target: 中国共产党临时中央委员会 (1935年—1936年)

description.zh-cn: 在四川卓木碉开会，决定另立“中国共产党中央委员会”。
description.en: Held a meeting in Zhuomudiao, Sichuan, and decided to establish a separate 'Central Committee of the Communist Party of China'.

relationships.target: 中国共产党临时中央委员会 (1935年—1936年)

relationships.source: 中国共产党临时中央委员会 (1935年—1936年)

description.zh-cn: 张国焘另立的“第二中央”宣布开除毛泽东的党籍。
description.en: The 'Second Central Committee' established by Zhang Guotao announced the expulsion of Mao Zedong from the party.

relationships.source: 中国共产党临时中央委员会 (1935年—1936年)

description.zh-cn: 张国焘另立的“第二中央”宣布开除周恩来的党籍。
description.en: The 'Second Central Committee' established by Zhang Guotao announced the expulsion of Zhou Enlai from the party.

relationships.source: 中国共产党临时中央委员会 (1935年—1936年)

description.zh-cn: 张国焘另立的“第二中央”宣布开除博古的党籍。
description.en: The 'Second Central Committee' established by Zhang Guotao announced the expulsion of Bo Gu from the party.

relationships.source: 中国共产党临时中央委员会 (1935年—1936年)

description.zh-cn: 张国焘另立的“第二中央”宣布开除洛甫（张闻天）的党籍。
description.en: The 'Second Central Committee' established by Zhang Guotao announced the expulsion of Luo Fu (Zhang Wentian) from the party.

relationships.target: 中国共产党临时中央委员会 (1935年—1936年)

description.zh-cn: 命令张国焘取消其“第二中央”。
description.en: Ordered Zhang Guotao to dissolve his 'Second Central Committee'.

description.zh-cn: 在校期间参加了五四运动，并担任北京学联主席，是北京学运领袖之一。
description.en: During his school years, he participated in the May Fourth Movement, served as the chairman of the Beijing Students' Federation, and was one of the leaders of the Beijing student movement.

description.zh-cn: 发动了白雀园肃反运动。
description.en: Launched the Baiqueyuan Purge.

description.zh-cn: 两支红军主力在四川懋功地区会师。
description.en: The two main forces of the Red Army met in the Maogong area of Sichuan.
